feed.title: SAP Community - SAP ERP
feed.subtitle: SAP ERP Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: CVI error "Enter the incoterm location 1" and "plausibility check failed for incoterm location 1"
entry.content: After the recent SAP update, we are encountering an error for the "Enter the incoterm location 1" and "Incoterm location 1 plausibility check failed" fields. Can anyone answer what the recent update is that we are suddenly getting this error when we are changing the supplier?

entry.title: SAP Hierarchies (Open source)
entry.content:
Hey all,

Just released an open source tool for flattening SAP hierarchies in 3rd party systems (e.g. Snowflake):

https://github.com/jchesch/sap-hierarchy-flattener

MIT License, so folks can do anything the way with it. 

Hope you find it helpful!

entry.title: Need Help: Deleting Multiple Schedule Lines in ME38
entry.content:
Hi SAP community,

I'm encountering a situation where I need to remove multiple schedule lines from different scheduling agreements in ME38. Is there a transaction code or method that allows for the mass deletion of schedule lines in ME38?

entry.title: How to identify in debugging that document posted is invoice/credit memo
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
I’m currently debugging the standard FM MRM_INVOICE_POST, which is triggered whenever an invoice or credit memo is posted. As part of our requirement, I need to implement conditional logic to differentiate between invoice and credit memo postings.

I tried checking in debug mode but couldn’t find any clear indicator. Could you please let me know if there’s any field, table, or structure that can help distinguish whether the posting is for an invoice or a credit memo? This will help me write the necessary conditional logic.

Thanks

entry.title: PO header and item text do not appear in printed form in selected languages
entry.content:
hello

our issue is the following, to which I could not find the solution;

we enter text in header and items in a PO:

I checked that the text language, supplier language, message language are the same:

For suppliers with language and  text in French, German, English the text is printed.

In other languages, such as Italian, the text is ignored and does not appear in the printout.

I tried to create a PO in Italian Logon (which should not matter) but the result is the same.

this happens in ECC as well as in S/4 hana.

where else can I check?

entry.title: MSR_VRM_GR Complete logistical process with goods receipt is greyed out
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

i am facing the following issue:

I have stock which is assigned on customer order and must be returned to supplier due to defects.

I create manually Advanced Returns PO.

in VL10B return delivery was created and the customer stock was posted GI.

in MSR_VRM_GR the replacement PO must be created. 

Useually when the stock is not assigned to any sales order then the button "complete logistical process with GR" is active and can be checked.

I wonder why the field "Complete Logistical Process with Goods receipt" is greyed out in case of special stock E?

I dont want to do one more inspection in the warehouse when the goods come back from Vendor. 

Thank you for your advice.

entry.title: Need to activate enhancement implementation that depends on a switch
entry.content:
Dear Team,

 We are trying to enhance report CIBDOP_DOWN_PP to fill one user field during the downloading of the production orders. We have noticed that it is mandatory to activate the linked switch ERP_UID_01. The point here is that we do not want to affect other enhancements but just IUID_APPL_01_CIBDOP_DOWN_PP.

The question, is there a way maybe creating our own switch to affect just this enhancement? Maybe other solution? 

Thanks in advanced and kind regards,

Alex.

entry.title: Error M7667 for SLED in MIGO 201 movement when SLED is in future date compared to posting date.
entry.content:
Error M7667 for SLED in MIGO 201 movement when SLED is in future date compared to posting date. Error "

Best before date/SLED 29.09.2025 of batch 0000026596 has been exceeded"

Posting date entered 01.09.2025.

entry.title: Mass Receive Rental Devices for Conversion
entry.content: Hello - I need to know if there is a way to mass receive rental devices that are being converted.  When a customer returns rental devices and we need to convert them in our system, we first have to receive them back into our plant and storage location.  Unfortunately, we currently do not have a way to mass receive rental devices and have to do them one by one.  This is very time consuming when you have 100 or more devices.  Any ideas?

entry.title: Error in archiving for HRCUSTAX object
entry.content:
We have configured HRCUSTAX object for archiving of data for employees. On running preprocessing job, we get following error for some of the records.

 

80000189   0210   FED   2010-09-01   9999-12-31          No data record for key 800001890210FED    9999123120100901000 before deletion
80000189   0161   FED   2010-09-01   2016-01-01          No data record for key 800001890161FED    2016010120100901000 before deletion

 

These entries are present in PA0210 and PA0161. They are not locked as well, yet we see these messages. It is possible to manually delete the record via PA30.  

Please suggest a fix.

entry.title: Adding calculated rows in SAP Analytics Cloud table for lightweight calculations
entry.content:
I am working on a P&L statement with several category trees. For example Expenses Category can include child-members such as: COGS, SG&A, and Depreciation & Amortization.

SAC has automatically summed up each category (tree) group.

In this case, I am trying to sum-up or subtract two (2) or more categories trees depending on the required calculation. My expectation is to display the calculated measure’s name e.g. Net Income and value below the used/existing measures. See example:

>Revenue

100

>Expenses

50

Net Income

50

Currently no values are been displayed only the formula cell references e.g. =A5-A6 or Sum (A5, A6). See attached the screenshots. Please note that (all) represents the totals of the entire column

The primary data is from an on-premise BW system and a flat file (blended data). SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) tenant is not using a planning license.

entry.title: Enquiry regarding downsizing of AWS-EC2 servers
entry.content:
Hi Team,

 

Downsizing of AWS-EC2 scale down is planned.

 

Target Systems: RDR-DB, AP, RAR-DB, IXOS-Quality

 

Related to OS settings, SAP memory parameter revision could you please advise us what are the necessary BASIS checks to be done?

 

Regards,

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Multiple Note Downloads - No Internet
entry.content:
Hi All Community Members
 
We have a demo system that require multiple SNotes to be implemented.
The problem we have is that the system does not have internet access.
I know that we can download SNotes from SAPforMe and upload it in the demo system, but it will take too much time to do 1 by 1.
The option to search for and download SNotes in SAPforMe directly from transaction SNote is also not possible because of the internet issue.
 
Is there a workaround for this type of situation. Maybe downloading multiple SNotes from SAPforMe in batch and copy the downloaded SNotes to filesystem, then upload to SNote?
 
Many Thanks

entry.title: VA35N layout different in S4 then ECC
entry.content:
Hello All.

In the migration from ECC to S4, the layout of some transactions have been changed. VA35N is one example. VL71, the output of it is also an example. 

Could you please let me know if there is something that can be done to revert that? 

Regards,

Leonardo Delgado

entry.title: Avoid accounting document while moving the stock from customer return stock
entry.content:
Currently, when customer returns are received, the stock is classified as customer stock. When we transfer the goods to unrestricted stock, it becomes our company’s stock. From there, we can proceed to scrap the goods if required.

In this process, the system generates two accounting documents:

When the stock is moved from customer (return) stock to unrestricted stock.

When the stock is moved from unrestricted stock to scrap.

We would like to know if there is any possibility to suppress the first accounting document (i.e., during the movement from customer return stock to unrestricted stock).

Can we get any SAP notes/ KBA, to get their confirmation on whether this is technically feasible or if it’s a standard system behavior that cannot be bypassed?

entry.title: Batch determination (different behavior between saved/released orders)
entry.content:
Hi everyone, I’m testing batch determination in production orders and noticed a difference between saved and released orders:

- When I save the first order, the selected batch is reserved. It is not proposed again in another order

- When I release the first order, the same batch is still proposed in a second order

So, the reservation only happens after saving, but not after releasing.

Can it be influenced through customizing? My goal is to make sure a batch cannot be assigned to multiple orders once it’s already used.

entry.title: A production order compnonent material 101 mvmt displays in MB51, but not in COGI
entry.content: A production order compnonent material 101 mvmt displayes in MB51, but no goods movement document in production order, it is not displaying in COGI, how to find out the missing material/transaction.

entry.title: Pre-compacted inventory data inconsistent for material
entry.content: Hi, I am getting an error "Pre-compacted inventory data inconsistent for material", while doing material-to-material transfer posting. Need your support on this.
